SamPy.dates.julians.fromHSTDeployment¶

SamPy.dates.julians.fromHSTDeployment(julian)¶

Returns the number of days that has passed since the deployment of the Hubble Space Telescope.

Returns:number of days since HST was deployed (24 Apr 1990)
